word: My brother, your soul is precious, yet from the light which God has given me I know that however great and perfect may be your knowledge of navigation, yet there are other things you need to learn. You need to listen to the words of Jesus, where He says, "Come unto Me, all ye that labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest: . . . for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls. For My yoke is easy, and My burden is light."
